Tocolytics

Tocolytics

β2-agonists salbutamol

Nitrates GTN

Anaesthetic agents

MgSO 4 - no evidence of a clinically useful effect (Cochrane)

Ca++ channel blockers - nifedipine

COX-inhibition - indomethacin - safety unclear, don’t use after 32/40 due to PDA

Oxytocin antagonists - Atociban - no clinical evidence (yet)
